parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name. Required

parameters.name: addChildren
parameters.description: Whether to add children of found foods.

parameters.name: minProteinPercent
parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: minFatPercent
parameters.description: The minimum percentage of fat the food must have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: maxFatPercent
parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
parameters.description: The minimum percentage of carbs the food must have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

parameters.name: metaInformation
parameters.description: Whether to return more meta information about the ingredients.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The strategy to sort ingredients by. You can sort by any nutrient listed here [(empty),meta-score,popularity,healthiness,price,time,random,max-used-ingredients,min-missing-ingredients,alcohol,caffeine,copper,energy,calories,calcium,carbohydrates,carbs,choline,cholesterol,total-fat,fluoride,trans-fat,saturated-fat,mono-unsaturated-fat,poly-unsaturated-fat,fiber,folate,folic-acid,iodine,iron,magnesium,manganese,vitamin-b3,niacin,vitamin-b5,pantothenic-acid,phosphorus,potassium,protein,vitamin-b2,riboflavin,selenium,sodium,vitamin-b1,thiamin,vitamin-a,vitamin-b6,vitamin-b12,vitamin-c,vitamin-d,vitamin-e,vitamin-k,sugar,zinc].

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The direction in which to sort. Must be either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).
